attributes.additional_details: Bring back national service! The majority of immigrants will disappear over night, new immigration will evaporate, riots will end, our budget deficit will drastically reduce and we will have enough troops to defend our streets, should we ever need that again. This one measure will solve so many problems, giving us the chance to leave the EU and put some power back in the hands of our own Courts and MPs. We can then hold a general election and regain Britain for the British
